extendedInfo.description: Dharma Meditation Trainer is a new and more elegant version of our old and popular Buddhist Meditation Trainer.Dharma Meditation Trainer is your personal trainer for relaxing and enlightening meditation. It features 10 levels of enlightenment with deeper quotes to meditate on in every level. All with a simple to use meditation timer.Simply start meditating for 5 minutes everyday to feel the difference. After ten days you will gain a level and further enlightenment. Added End-Of-Meditation-Sound as requested!You can easily set the meditation sounds and target duration in the preferences screen (click the phone's menu button in the first screen). Dharma Meditation Trainer helps you remember to meditate with a daily notification. You can turn this off or on in the configuration page.Early Buddhist philosophers created a pluralist metaphysical and phenomenological system, in which all experiences of people, things and events can be broken down into smaller and smaller perceptual or perceptual-ontological units called "dharmas". Dharma Meditation Trainer - Your trainer to happiness and enlightenment.Recent features:* Progressive and not random meditation plan* 20 new photos* More than 100 quotations * Added Homescreen Widget* Support for SD installation* Meditation reminder notification - configurable in setting page.* Default to play sound at the end of the meditation.* Added End-Of-Meditation-Sound* Configurable meditation sounds* Configurable target duration * Every level uncovers more quotes and photos* Share quotes to earn more Karma points* Ten enlightening levels* Easy to use controls

reviews.title: A keeper
reviews.comment: One of the best free apps I have downloaded! The music is wonderful and is a great way for me to get back into meditation!
reviews.author: Cheryl Plourde

reviews.title: Simple & effective
reviews.comment: This app has a nice & clean ui, simple options and is very easy to use.  This makes it a great companion and guide for meditation during my busy day.
reviews.author: Kris Hardy

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Love meditation it\'s relaxing and peaceful
reviews.author: ramases bullock

reviews.title: Pretty Good
reviews.comment: Great app.  You can change different sounds to meditate too.  None of the sounds are bad.  Has a useful notification to remind you to meditate.  I\'m going with this one.  Plus great benefits from meditation.  Enjoy
reviews.author: Frankie Federinko Jr

reviews.title: Good reminder
reviews.comment: I like that this app reminds you to meditate. The seen bells are great too. They remind me of the monastery I stayed in. I would like too see some guided meditation, music and maybe talks on faith added.
reviews.author: Liz Mcdevitt

reviews.comment: Is a great way to get back into meditation. The mantras are inspiring and honest and the level advancements help you learn to meditate more and more. Definitely worth five stars.
reviews.author: Jeffrey Smith

reviews.title: Helpful
reviews.comment: Finding this app helpful for getting back into meditation. I like that you can set it to give daily reminders. I find the quotes somehwat unnecessary but understand why they\'re there.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app..recomend it for all
reviews.comment: I have been meditating for many years, but im always looking for more info. This app is great..from the reninder,the pictures,the sounds, and the dharmas...its like having my alter on my phone. Thank you
reviews.author: Chad Herman

reviews.title: So easy, so effective
reviews.comment: I\'ve been practicing meditation for many years. When I first started with this med practice I thought it was too easy. It is very easy, and it has directed my attention better than any other aid I\'ve tried. I can\'t wait to get back to the little bell!
reviews.author: Jodianne Fretz

reviews.title: Insightful
reviews.comment: The words of wisdom are easy to focus on and insightful. This is my first time meditating, so far so good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One of the best ways I know to jump right in
reviews.comment: Simple, clear, consise, and lightweight app. The reminder feature is great for those who want to commit to practice, but need a little extra push. Just three minutes a day and you\'ll be feeling rejuvenated before long. Many thanks to the devs!
reviews.author: David Guti\303\251rrez

reviews.title: Great app!!
reviews.comment: I downloaded it to help me sleep and i am now falling asleep quickly. Usually before the meditation is even over. Would have given it 5 stars but it stopped working and I had to delete and am now starting all over again after being at level 10. Would reccomend.
reviews.author: Teresa Tipton

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: An improvement over the original. You\'re giving more options than before like types of sound. Although some of those options didn\'t work, but all the same, good app
reviews.author: Duwan Green

reviews.title: Like the app
reviews.comment: I like that it has a reminder. I\'m still leaning how to meditate. So thi feature is quite helpful..It would be nice if you added something in relation to breathing techniques
reviews.author: Diddy Young

reviews.title: Love it!!! <3 <3 <3
reviews.comment: I live this app because it slowly increases your time which is good for beginners. However I dislike the fact that as soon as your time is over the words of wisdom cannot be seen, I would prefer to see them afterwards.
reviews.author: Jill Zvacek

reviews.title: Simple and effective
reviews.comment: Not a bad meditation timer.  10 second bell rings, attractive pictures, and words of wisdom.  5th star for more bell sound choices...
reviews.author: Tony Siciliano

reviews.title: Good help
reviews.comment: A good app to help with meditation.  The three-minute timer seems a little short, but it also means you can do this no matter how busy you think you are.
reviews.author: Alan Willis

reviews.title: Its helpful in concentration.
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using it for 2 weeks it is helpful if u can give it ur time an attention, an understanding.
reviews.author: Spenser Kizzire

reviews.title: Best Daily Meditation Reminder
reviews.comment: I have tried to build a habit of daily meditations, but find when the days get too busy, I didn\'t get around to my meditation. And those are the times, i need it most!   Because of this easy app reminder, I have now been able to stick to my daily mediations, no matter how busy my day! Love this!   I especially like the beautiful soft tone that ends the meditation time.   Thanks for this app!!!
reviews.author: Magdalena Ortega

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: Allow us to set times shorter than 15 mins. There should be times for 5 and 10 as well. There needs to be shorter times for people just beginning to meditate. Shorter times are essential to building a habit/routine! Please add this ASAP Thank you!
reviews.author: Cole Hoffele
